entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
